projects.fullDescription: Exploring new aesthetics with local and upcoming artists, creating unique album covers that stand out. Whether it's a single or an album, let's make something really special.

projects.title: Interactive Code
projects.fullDescription: Uniting art and technology, immerse yourself in a digital dream. From interactive installations to video games, I can help you create a unique experience for your audience.

projects.title: Animations and 3D
projects.fullDescription: From 3D modeling to rendering to animation, realistic or stylized. With a strong background in Blender, I can provide visuals that will attract your audience.

projects.title: Jewerly Design
projects.description: CAD assisted design, ready for 3D printing
projects.fullDescription: Jewelry design is a delicate process that requires precision and attention to detail. I can help you create the perfect piece for your collection. The rings below were designed for Solan, an upcoming local jewelry brand.
